scripts.clean: rm dist chrome firefox facebook chrome.zip firefox.zip dist.zip -rf;mkdir -p dist;
scripts.browserify: node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/scripts/index.js | node node_modules/uglifyjs/bin/uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -mc > dist/index.js
scripts.zip: rm dist.zip;zip -X -r dist.zip dist/* && ls -l dist.zip
scripts.build: npm run clean;npm run copy & npm run css; wait; npm run browserify;
scripts.deploy: npm run clean; npm run build;rsync -avz dist/* direct.ash.ms:/var/www/ash.ms/public_html/js13k2k15/
scripts.watch: npm run server & node node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run build' src/scripts --ignoreDotFiles
scripts.build-chrome: npm run clean;npm run build & cp src/chrome/ chrome/ -R;wait;cp dist/* chrome/ -R;cd chrome;zip ../chrome.zip -X -r *
scripts.build-firefox: npm run clean;npm run build & cp src/firefox/ firefox/ -R;wait;cp dist/* firefox/ -R;cd firefox;zip ../firefox.zip -X -r *
scripts.build-facebook: npm run clean;mkdir facebook;npm run build;cp dist/* facebook/ -r; cp src/facebook/* facebook/
scripts.deploy-facebook: npm run clean; npm run build-facebook;rsync -avz facebook/* direct.ash.ms:/var/www/spacekidgames.com/public_html/facebook/roadblocks/
